solution_line_template: Hillary needs to read for {assignment_hours} hour which equals {total_assignment_minutes} minutes.
Hillary has read for a total of {read_friday} minutes + {read_saturday} = <<{read_friday}+{read_saturday}={read_so_far}>>{read_so_far} minutes so far.
Hillary will need to read for {total_assignment_minutes} minutes - {read_so_far} = <<{total_assignment_minutes}-{read_so_far}={remaining_minutes_sunday}>>{remaining_minutes_sunday} minutes on Sunday.
